Articles.Content:
A small Project i wanted to do.

Say hello to the rag dolls you never realise until you kill them in the name of science.

By Grand Lander!!!!!!!!

Edited September 2, 2012 by Grand Lander
Yer i dont know how to put as a full image like other posts

Try imgur, copy the bb code here and put it in a spoiler tag.

If you scroll down here, you can click on 'BB Code is On' which explains how to use the tags.

Thanks MrPwner seems you learn something new everyday.

But how you do spoiler tag?

Thanks MrPwner seems you learn something new everyday.

Edited September 2, 2012 by Felsmak
Which one's going to be the employee of the month?
Good old Jordorf Kerman, I think I managed to kill him off last night.

Where is Sigfred Kerman? He was my favorite kerbal (sorry, Jeb) until I accidentaly killed him.

Anyway, nice picture
Where is Chadrim, I have launched numerous satellites with him and he's currently in a homemade car at KSC.

B...but... NONE OF MY KERBALS ARE THERE!

  1. Bobsey Kerman: Mun-Minmus 'Super Veteran' (landed on Mun 3-4 times, Minmus once). Has also flown several orbital missions. Helped to deploy the only 2 satellites around Kerbin.
  2. Sherrey Kerman: Mun-Minmus 'Super Veteran' (landed on Mun twice, Minmus twice). Has also flown several orbital and atmospheric missions. Helped to deploy the only 2 satellites around Kerbin.
  3. Thomald Kerman: Mun-Minmus Veteran. Has also flown several orbital missions. Helped to deploy the only 2 satellites around Kerbin. Leader of 'Mun Base 1' mission (semi-permanent residence on Mun).
  4. Guswig Kerman: Has landed on Mun once, unsuccessfully (rescued). Also flown 2 orbital missions. Member of 'Mun Base 1'.
  5. Gildred Kerman: Has landed on Mun once, unsuccessfully (rescued). Also flown 2 orbital missions.
  6. Joezor Kerman: Has landed on Mun once, unsuccessfully (rescued). Flown 1-2 orbital missions. Member of 'Mun Base 1'.
  7. Ronson Kerman: Flown 1 orbital mission.
  8. Wilwise Kerman: Unknown.
  9. Samlock Kerman: Unknown.

I may well have more Kerbals, but these are the guys I know are in my complement. Let this also be considered as their current statistics as well.
